name: GOG Galaxy
notes: Now work: - Crysis - Fallout 2 (Restoration Project) - Mafia - Doom 3: BFG Edition Fixed crackling sound in Metro series (xact). VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action and Undertale crashes on wine <4.0 (bug report), use `MESA_GL_VERSION_OVERRIDE=3.0` env to make it work, if you using wine >=4.0 and these games crash after window is shown disable origin overlay for these games.

task.description: Setting version to xp for Crysis.exe...
task.name: set_regedit

task.description: Setting version to xp for Crysis64.exe...
task.name: set_regedit

task.description: Setting ddraw to native for FALLOUT2.EXE
task.name: set_regedit

task.description: Setting winegstreamer to native for Game.exe
task.name: set_regedit

content:
files:
- galaxy: https://cdn.gog.com/open/galaxy/client/setup_galaxy_1.2.54.23.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  args: /runWithoutUpdating /deelevated
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/GOG Galaxy/GalaxyClient.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: xact
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    executable: galaxy
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Setting version to xp for Crysis.exe...
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\AppDefaults\Crysis.exe
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: winxp64
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Setting version to xp for Crysis64.exe...
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\AppDefaults\Crysis64.exe
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: winxp64
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Setting ddraw to native for FALLOUT2.EXE
    key: ddraw
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\AppDefaults\FALLOUT2.EXE\DllOverrides
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: native
- task:
    app: vcrun6
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: LS3D_setup
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Illusion Softworks\Mafia
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_BINARY
    value: 14 00 00 05 00 00 00 04 00 00 20 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00
      00 00 01 00 01 00 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 80 3f 00 00 80 3f 02 00 00
      00 02 00 00 00 03 00 00 00 02 00 00 00
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Setting winegstreamer to native for Game.exe
    key: winegstreamer
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\AppDefaults\Game.exe\DllOverrides
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: null
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    allow_glsl_builtin_variable_redeclaration: true
    force_glsl_extensions_warn: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_6: native,builtin
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
